titleStmt.title: By the Queene where in the Parliament holden at Westminster the second day of April in the xiii yeere of the reigne of our soueraigne lady the Queene, there was for the reliefe of diuers poore decaied townes, & of great multitudes of her poore subiects ... an acte for the continuance of making of cappes ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: Second part of title from first 7 lines of text.
